| --- |
| Jim Bolger |

The only person mentioned in the paragraph is Jim Bolger, who is referred to twice. The other entities mentioned, "National" and "NZ First," are not people, so they should not be included in the table.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Upon reevaluating the paragraph, I realized that "National" and "New Zealand First" are the only entities that clearly refer to organizations. "National" is a political party, while "New Zealand First" is also a political party and not a reference to the country of New Zealand.

Therefore, the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to organizations are:
